MAC

IHMAC
MAC

MAC

An ActionScript 3 implementation of MAC, Message Authentication Code for use with SSL 3.0.  Loosely copyrighted by Bobby Parker.  As3crypto copyrighted by Henri Torgemane.

See LICENSE.txt for full license information.

Functions

MAC

public function MAC(hash: IHash,  
bits: uint = )

Create a MAC object (for SSL 3.0 ) and optionally a number of bits to return.  The MAC will be truncated to that size if needed.
